function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Investigating the effects of different occupant distribution, air exchange rates, working hours, and class duration on HVAC system's energy consumption and the number of infected people with COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and higher energy consumption if optimal schedules for occupants are not provided","Mitigation":"Develop optimal schedules for occupants to align internal load with climatic conditions and prevent crowding","Technologies":"Optimization algorithms, NSGA-II algorithm","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management, facility managers"},{"Description":"Simulating the effects of ventilation rate, working hours, and class durations on HVAC system's energy consumption and the number of infected people with COVID-19","Impact":"Risk of increased COVID-19 transmission and higher energy consumption if best approaches for controlling the number of infected people are not implemented","Mitigation":"Precisely investigate ventilation rate, working hours, and class durations to propose best approaches for controlling the number of infected people and decreasing energy consumption","Technologies":"Simulation models, optimization algorithms","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management, facility managers"},{"Description":"Multi-objective optimization problem with energy consumption and number of infected people with COVID-19 as objectives","Impact":"Risk of increased COVID-19 transmission and higher energy consumption if optimization problem is not solved effectively","Mitigation":"Develop and use optimization algorithms to simultaneously minimize energy consumption and the number of infected people","Technologies":"Optimization algorithms, NSGA-II algorithm","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management, facility managers"}]}
